title: Digital World: Video Clipping and Merging
addVideoTip1: Currently only supports MP4 format videos
addVideoTip2: If it is a video in other formats, please convert the format to MP4 first.
startTimeTip: Set the start time in the video control bar
endTimeTip: Set the end time in the video control bar
addDirTip: Will find all video files in the selected folder and subfolders
videoBitrateTip: The higher the value, the better the video quality, but the larger the volume
delConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete it?
settingTimeTip1: The video is currently being cut and this operation cannot be performed
settingTimeTip2: The end time must be greater than the start time
